name: hint
description: hint is a tool for adding a password to a link; in other words, for encrypting and decrypting URLs.

HUSKY_SKIP_INSTALL.description: Skip the husky git hook setup

WHEELMAP_TOKEN.description: Configure the token to be used for the Wheelmap service.

GH_TOKEN.description: Configure the token to be used for the GitHub services.

TWITCH_CLIENT_ID.description: Configure the client id to be used for the Twitch service.

TWITCH_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Configure the client secret to be used for the Twitch service.

WEBLATE_API_KEY.description: Configure the API key to be used for the Weblate service.
